verses.text: The \w fool|strong="H5036"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \add There is\add* no \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. They are \w corrupt|strong="H7843"\w*, they have done \w abominable|strong="H8581"\w* \w works|strong="H5949"\w*, \add there is\add* none that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* looked \w down|strong="H8259"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* upon the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* if \w there|strong="H3426"\w* were any that did \w understand|strong="H7919"\w*, \add and\add* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

They are all gone \w aside|strong="H5493"\w*, they are \add all\add* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* become \w filthy|strong="H0444"\w*: \add there is\add* none that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, no, not \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.\f + \fr 14.3 \ft filthy: Heb. stinking\f*

Have all the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* no \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*? who eat \w up|strong="H0398"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add as\add* they \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w call|strong="H7121"\w* not upon the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

There were they in \w great|strong="H6343"\w* \w fear|strong="H6342"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* in the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.\f + \fr 14.5 \ft were…: Heb. they feared a fear\f*
Ye have \w shamed|strong="H0954"\w* the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* his \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*.

Oh \w that|strong="H5414"\w* the \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add were come\add* out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*! when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* bringeth \w back|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w*, \add and\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.\f + \fr 14.7 \ft Oh…: Heb. Who will give\f*
